overview: The quiet village of Bramley End is taken over by German troops posing as Royal Engineers. Their task is to disrupt England's radar network in preparation for a full scale German invasion. Once the villagers discover the true identity of the troops, they do whatever they can to thwart the Nazis plans.
tagline: Went the day well? We died and never knew. But, well or ill, freedom we died for you.
title: Went the Day Well?
